body:
Added some statements to find that the test is actually failing and the assert does not works the way it is expected to. Following is the git diff of the change I made to find out the issue.

After the change I ran test in directory k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm to find out that TestInstallRelease_VerifyOptions is erring out.


```sushils-mbp:helm sushilkumar$ git diff
diff --git a/pkg/helm/helm_test.go b/pkg/helm/helm_test.go
index 00db8b4e..3c11f2da 100644
--- a/pkg/helm/helm_test.go
+++ b/pkg/helm/helm_test.go
@@ -18,6 +18,7 @@ package helm // import "k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm"

 import (
        "errors"
+       "fmt"
        "path/filepath"
        "reflect"
        "testing"
@@ -123,17 +124,22 @@ func TestInstallRelease_VerifyOptions(t *testing.T) {

        // BeforeCall option to intercept helm client InstallReleaseRequest
        b4c := BeforeCall(func(_ context.Context, msg proto.Message) error {
+               fmt.Println("Testing switch statements: 1")
                switch act := msg.(type) {
                case *tpb.InstallReleaseRequest:
                        t.Logf("InstallReleaseRequest: %#+v\n", act)
+                       fmt.Println("Testing switch statements: 2")
                        assert(t, exp, act)
                default:
+                       fmt.Println("Testing switch statements: 3")
                        t.Fatalf("expected message of type InstallReleaseRequest, got %T\n", act)
                }
+               fmt.Println("Testing switch statements: 4")
                return errSkip
        })

-       NewClient(b4c).InstallRelease(chartName, namespace, ops...)
+       _, err := NewClient(b4c).InstallRelease(chartName, namespace, ops...)
+       fmt.Printf("Got error (%v)\n", err)
 }

 // Verify DeleteOptions's are applied to an UninstallReleaseRequest correctly.
sushils-mbp:helm sushilkumar$ go test ./... -v
=== RUN   TestListReleases_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestListReleases_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
	helm_test.go:83: ListReleasesRequest: &services.ListReleasesRequest{Limit:2, Offset:"offset", SortBy:2, Filter:"filter", SortOrder:1, StatusCodes:[]release.Status_Code{4, 2, 1, 3}, Namespace:"namespace"}
=== RUN   TestInstallRelease_VerifyOptions
Got error (stat alpine: no such file or directory)
--- PASS: TestInstallRelease_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
=== RUN   TestDeleteRelease_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestDeleteRelease_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
	helm_test.go:169: UninstallReleaseRequest: &services.UninstallReleaseRequest{Name:"test", DisableHooks:true, Purge:true, Timeout:0}
=== RUN   TestUpdateRelease_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestUpdateRelease_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
=== RUN   TestRollbackRelease_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestRollbackRelease_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
	helm_test.go:247: RollbackReleaseRequest: &services.RollbackReleaseRequest{Name:"test", DryRun:true, DisableHooks:true, Version:2, Recreate:false, Timeout:0, Wait:false}
=== RUN   TestReleaseStatus_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestReleaseStatus_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
	helm_test.go:274: GetReleaseStatusRequest: &services.GetReleaseStatusRequest{Name:"test", Version:2}
=== RUN   TestReleaseContent_VerifyOptions
--- PASS: TestReleaseContent_VerifyOptions (0.00s)
	helm_test.go:301: GetReleaseContentRequest: &services.GetReleaseContentRequest{Name:"test", Version:2}
PASS
ok  	k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm	0.016s
=== RUN   TestHelmHome
--- PASS: TestHelmHome (0.00s)
PASS
ok  	k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm/helmpath	0.005s
=== RUN   TestGetFirstPod
--- PASS: TestGetFirstPod (0.00s)
PASS
ok  	k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm/portforwarder	0.052s
```
title: TestInstallRelease_VerifyOptions k8s.io/helm/pkg/helm does not works as expected
